constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 114 (Tuesday, July 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SWALWELL:
H.R. 8340.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, of the United States Constitution,
specifically Clause 18 (relating to the power to make all
laws necessary and proper for carrying out the powers vested
in congress).
[Page H5975]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Educator Down Payment Assistance Act of 2022
